sentences.pinyin: yǔ shuǐ huì jí zài dì miàn shàng.
sentences.translation: The rainwater gathers on the ground.

sentences.simplifiedText: 雨水的积累可能导致地面积水，进一步造成洪灾。
sentences.traditionalText: 雨水的積累可能導致地面積水，進一步造成洪災。
sentences.pinyin: yǔ shuǐ de jī lěi kě néng dǎo zhì dì miàn jī shuǐ, jìn yí bù zào chéng hóng zāi.
sentences.translation: The accumulation of rainwater may cause flooding on the ground, further leading to flood disasters.
